0.2.name: wordpress/statrix
0.2.description:
Statrix plugin collects data about your blog visits. It creates charts and lists of the full data history in real-time, which you can browse, filter and export immediately after plugin activation. The plugin keeps the full visits history, so you can make reports about any period of time you want.

Overview mode

You are able to generate diagrams of user-defined data subsets for:

  • visitors
  • spiders
  • RSS readers

You can find out the data and display charts for:

  • the most viewed pages
  • visitors browsers
  • visitors operation systems

Hits, Search Terms and Spiders mode

You are able to:

  • easy browse the history
  • filter by multiple criteria
  • export the data (filtered or not) by one single click

Options mode

You can configure the data collection for:

  • Anonymous visitors
  • Logged users
  • Spiders
